attributes.action: Fund the Gladiators charity and others like it, which really DO reduce youth crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dispathches (Ch 4, 28th Jan 08) featured an organisation called Gladiators, which provides outlets for the testosterone-charged energies of youths let down by successive Governments' failures to address their needs for something to do other than knifing each other.  90% of the funding is raised by Gladiators itself.

Youths are bused safely through warring "turfs" to engage in supervised competitive activities such as football, where they actually make friends with members of rival gangs!

This is where taxpayers' money should go, rather than on naiive if well-intentioned politically-correect initiatives to address "community issues".

Put the  money where it actually makes a difference.
